about_the_game:
Dinoport is a challenging precision platformer that pushes your skills to the limit with its unique blend of teleportation and dashing mechanics.

Key Features:
Master the Teleport Mechanic: Precision is key. Navigate through treacherous environments by teleporting across deadly gaps, dodging obstacles, and through walls

High-Speed Dashing: Combine teleportation with quick dashes to overcome intricate platforming challenges. Timing and accuracy will be your greatest allies as you race against the clock in this fast-paced adventure.


Tightly Designed Levels: Each level is crafted to test your reflexes and strategic thinking, offering a satisfying blend of difficulty and reward. Every platform, enemy, and hazard is meticulously placed to keep you on your toes.


Retro-Inspired Aesthetics: Dive into a world that marries retro pixel art with modern gameplay mechanics. The vibrant, dynamic environments and quirky dinosaur characters add charm to the intense platforming action.


Unforgiving Difficulty: Are you up for the challenge? Dinoport is designed for players who crave difficulty. Every jump, teleport, and dash must be executed with precision to progress.

About the Game:
In Dinoport, you play as a daring dinosaur on a quest to navigate a series of perilous landscapes. Using your teleportation power and unparalleled dashing abilities, you'll traverse intricate levels filled with dangers at every turn. Precision and quick reflexes are crucial as you teleport through tight spaces, evade deadly traps, and make split-second decisions.



With its challenging gameplay and satisfying mechanics, Dinoport is the ultimate test of your platforming prowess. Are you ready to take on the challenge and teleport your way to victory?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or later, SteamOS 2.0
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible graphics card (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
  • VR Support: N/A

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio

name: Dinoport

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: NA

short_description: In Dinoport, you're a daring dinosaur navigating perilous landscapes with teleportation and dashing abilities. Precision and quick reflexes are key as you teleport through tight spaces, evade deadly traps, and conquer intricate levels. Test your platforming skills in this challenging adventure!
